text: Matteo Mulas (born 16 March 1992) is an Italian rower who won a silver medal at the 2018 World Championships in Plovdiv, Bulgaria.LM4x results ==Championships== *World Rowing Championships :Chungju 2013: bronze medal LM4x. :Plovdiv 2018: silver medal LM4x. *European Rowing Championships :Glasgow 2018: gold medal ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male rowers
title: Matteo Mulas
